ControlHintDef.description: In Actor Moveable (Trolley or Pushblock) - FREE LOOK
Priming or Ready to throw Primed Grenade - BLANK
Interact Mode - Nothing Under Cursor - BLANK
MOUNTED GUN - Gripping Weapon Mount - FIRE
In Actor Moveable (Trolley or Pushblock) - SPRINT
Bleeding - NOT Holding/have attached MedPen or held Loaded Healing Gun/Tool - MedGun Attached OR Stored - EQUIP MED-GUN
Bleeding - NOT Holding/have attached MedPen or held Loaded Healing Gun/Tool - Multi-Tool Healing Attached OR Stored - EQUIP MULTI-TOOL
Helmet Visor Needs Wiping - WIPE VISOR
Prone - Back OR Front - PRONE TOGGLE (exit)
Holding Pen - Mask Symptoms - MASK SYMPTOMS (INJECT SELF)
Holding Pen - Overdose Revival - REDUCE BDL (INJECT SELF)
Near Interactable Or Near Draggable Body - QUICK INTERACT
Holding Weapon - Ammo Empty - Ammo On Suit OR Ammo in Inventory - RELOAD
Holding Weapon - Ammo Empty - No Ammo - Other Weapon On Suit OR Inventory - WEAPON SELECT [1]
Holding Weapon - Ammo Empty - No Ammo - Other Weapon On Suit OR Inventory - WEAPON SELECT [3]
Holding MultiTool - No Attachment - Tool Attachment in Inventory - CUSTOMIZE
Holding Tractor Beam (Dedicated Gun OR Multi-Tool) - Ready/ADS - SHOOT
Holding Mining Beam (Dedicated Gun OR Multi-Tool) - Ready/ADS - SHOOT
Holding Medical Beam (Dedicated Gun) - Aim At Self - SHOOT
Holding Medical Beam (Multi-Tool) - Aim At Self - SHOOT
Holding Weapon - Inspecting - Can Be Customised - CUSTOMIZE
Nothing Equipped In Hand - (Not Greenzone, Not Ladder) - EQUIP WEAPON [1]
Nothing Equipped In Hand - (Not Greenzone, Not Ladder) - EQUIP WEAPON [3]
**Holding Weapon - Ammo Low - Ammo In Inventory OR On Suit - RELOAD **Needs check for matching ammo - also new ActorItem attachment types
Incapacitated OR Overdosed OR Unconscious - RESPAWN
QSWheel Open - OnHover menu option - RELEASE INPUT (to navigate)
QSWheel Open - OnHover menu RELEASE INPUT (to select)
MOUNTED GUN - Gripping Weapon Mount - ADS
Pre-Take, or Take, or Stow, or Unstow - BLANK
Priming or Ready to throw Primed Grenade - BLANK
In Actor Moveable (Trolley or Pushblock) - Sprinting - Sprint Toggle Mode Active - STOP SPRINTING
In Actor Moveable (Trolley or Pushblock) - RUN (Sprint)
Interact Mode - Nothing Under Cursor - BLANK
Holding Weapon - ADS - Has Auto Sight AND NOT Auto Zeroed - ZEROING (AUTO)
Holding MedGun - ADS - Toggle Interact Mode: False - SET DOSE
Holding MedGun - ADS - Toggle Interact Mode: True - SET DOSE
Holding Weapon - ADS - Toggle Option False - No Zeroing - EXIT ADS
Holding Weapon - ADS - Toggle Option - EXIT ADS
Sprinting - Sprint Toggle Mode Active - STOP SPRINTING
Holding Pen - Mask Symptoms - INJECT OTHER (MASK SYMPTOMS)
Holding Pen - Overdose Revival - INJECT OTHER (REDUCE BDL)
Holding Grenade - Prime & Throw UNDERARM THROW
Crouching - Crouch Toggle: True - CROUCH TOGGLE (exit)
Nothing Equipped In Hand - Equip Throwable
Base - Default - Toggle Interact Mode: False - INTERACT MODE
Base - Default - Toggle Interact Mode: True - INTERACT MODE
**MISSION Receiving Start Prompt - ACCEPT ** needs "received mission" condition
Incapacitated OR Overdosed OR Unconscious - OPEN CHAT
Bleeding - Holding MedGun OR Multi-Tool-Healing - NOT In Self Heal Mode - FIRE MODE
Bleeding - NOT Holding MedPen or Loaded Healing Gun/Tool - MedPen Attached - EQUIP MEDPEN
QSWheel Open - Segment Has Contextual Menu - Open CONTEXTUAL MENU
QSWheel Open - Has Pages - PAGE NAVIGATION
Pre-Take, or Take, or Stow, or Unstow - BLANK
Interact Mode - ZOOM - When In Kiosk & ScreenUnderCursor : ALWAYS SHOW
*+*Holding Primed Grenade - CANCEL THROW *+*Cancel Prime is broken
Holding Carryable (Not grenade) - Throwing - CANCEL THROW
Starving Damage - Food in Inventory & Not holding Food- OPEN INVENTORY
Dehydration Damage - Drink in Inventory & Not holding Drink - OPEN INVENTORY
Mounted Gun - Gripping Weapon Mount - EXIT
In Actor Moveable (Trolley or Pushblock) - EXIT
Holding Tractor Beam - ENTER DETACH MODE
Holding Tractor Beam - ENTER TRAVERSAL MODE
Holding MedGun - ADS - Toggle Interact Mode: False - EXIT ADS
Holding Weapon OR Combat Throwable - GreenZone - HOLSTER
Holding Weapon with Alt Fire Mode & Has UnderBarrel Attachment - No GreenZone - USE ATTACHMENT & ALT FIRE MODE
Holding Weapon with Alt Fire Mode - No GreenZone - ALT FIRE MODE
Holding Weapon/Gadget Ready - Has UnderBarrel Attachment - USE ATTACHMENT
Holding Weapon OR Combat Throwable - HOLSTER
Melee Knife OR Unarmed Fists Blocking - DODGE
Unarmed Fists or Melee Knife - BLOCK
Holding Drink OR Food & Wearing Helmet - OPEN PIT (Remove helmet)
Holding Weapon - In Melee Range (NOT Takedown) - WEAPON MELEE
Nothing Equipped - MedPen Attached - EQUIP CONSUMABLE
**MISSION Receiving Start Prompt - DECLINE ** needs "Received Mission" condition
